name: Magnetic Rumble (AlexRak2)
description:
An Arena Combat game made in less then 24 hours for a challenge. Grab metals, slam them against enemies and win the prize of nothing! THERE WILL BE NO UPDATES TO THIS GAME, IT WILL BE BUGGY. 

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Throw Metal

Right Click: Grab Metal
